notesStmt.note: Reprints in the following order: STC 11862.5: "A sermon on the parable of the sower"; STC 11871: "Two sermons upon I. Peter 5. vers. 8 and 9"; STC 11857.5: "Foure sermons uppon the seven chiefe vertues of faith"; STC 11860: "A godlie, zealous, and profitable sermon upon the second chapter of saint James"; and STC 11862.3: "A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse the thirtie day of May"; adding a sermon on James iii 1-12 before the last. Contents list on title page verso also calls for a reissue? of STC 11870, which is not present.--Cf. STC.
